= File Location =

The location for the service file is below:

{{{bash
sudo touch /etc/systemd/system/<your-name>.service
}}}


== File Contents ==

Basic service files look like the following:

{{{bash
[Unit]
Description=My Startup

[Service]
ExecStart=/location/to/my/script.sh

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
}}}


Description::
:: A description for the file

ExecStart::
:: Path to the script (or rather what to execute)

WantedBy::
:: Start right before the user starts the graphics


= Enabling the Service =

{{{bash
systemctl status my-startup.service
sudo systemctl enable my-startup.service
}}}
